49237.en: <start_lip_sync n00549 _normal m00001>Here's your dolboard. Take good care of it.<stop_lip_animation n00549 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49237.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00549 _normal m00001>「さあ　あなたの　ドルボードよ。
　大事にしてあげて。<stop_lip_animation n00549 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49237.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00549 _normal m00001>: 자, 당신의 도르보드야.
　소중히 아껴 줘.<stop_lip_animation n00549 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49237.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00549 _normal m00001>来，这是你的多尔浮板，
要好好珍惜。<stop_lip_animation n00549 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49237.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00549 _normal m00001>來，這是你的德爾浮板，
要好好珍惜。<stop_lip_animation n00549 CLOSE_MOUTH>

42173.ja:
クエスト『<%sEV_QUEST_NAME>』を
クリアしました！
　<update_quedate><open_irai>

49240.en:
<start_lip_sync n00549 _normal m00001>Ah... Sorry. You already have your own dolboard, don't
you.<stop_lip_animation n00549 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49240.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00549 _normal m00001>「あっ……ごめんなさい。
　あなたは　もう　自分のドルボードを
　持っていたのね。<stop_lip_animation n00549 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49240.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00549 _normal m00001>: 앗…… 미안.
　당신은 이미 도르보드를
　갖고 있구나.<stop_lip_animation n00549 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49240.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00549 _normal m00001>啊……抱歉，
你已经有自己的
多尔浮板了啊。<stop_lip_animation n00549 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49240.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00549 _normal m00001>啊……抱歉，
你已經有自己的
德爾浮板了啊。<stop_lip_animation n00549 CLOSE_MOUTH>

49241.en:
<start_lip_sync n00549 _normal m00001>It's okay, I'll take care of this baby. You can take
this instead.<stop_lip_animation n00549 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49241.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00549 _normal m00001>「大丈夫。この子は　私が引き取るわ。
　あなたは　代わりに　これを受け取って。<stop_lip_animation n00549 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49241.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00549 _normal m00001>: 괜찮아, 이 아이는 내가 맡을 테니까.
　대신 당신한테는 이걸 줄게.<stop_lip_animation n00549 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49241.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00549 _normal m00001>没关系，就由我来收下它。
相对地，你就收下这个。<stop_lip_animation n00549 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49241.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00549 _normal m00001>沒關係，就由我來收下它。
相對地，你就收下這個。<stop_lip_animation n00549 CLOSE_MOUTH>

49238.en:
<start_lip_sync n00549 _normal m00001>While I was repairing this baby, we were talking. It
said that you look like it's previous owner.<stop_lip_animation n00549 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49238.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00549 _normal m00001>「直している間　この子と　お話をしてたの。
　あなたは　前の持ち主に似てるんだって。<stop_lip_animation n00549 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49238.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00549 _normal m00001>: 고치는 동안 이 아이와 얘기했는데
　당신이 전 주인과 닮았대.<stop_lip_animation n00549 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49238.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00549 _normal m00001>修理的时候，我和这板子谈过了。
听说你很像它以前的主人呢。<stop_lip_animation n00549 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49238.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00549 _normal m00001>修理的時候，我和這板子談過了。
聽說你很像它以前的主人呢。<stop_lip_animation n00549 CLOSE_MOUTH>

49239.en:
<start_lip_sync n00549 _normal m00001>Since that's the case, I think you and this baby will
surely get along swell.<stop_lip_animation n00549 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49239.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00549 _normal m00001>「だから　あなたなら　きっと
　この子と　仲良くやっていけると思う。<stop_lip_animation n00549 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49239.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00549 _normal m00001>: 그러니 당신이라면 틀림없이
　이 아이와 사이좋게 지낼 수 있을 거야.<stop_lip_animation n00549 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49239.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00549 _normal m00001>所以，我想你一定
能和它好好相处的。<stop_lip_animation n00549 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49239.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00549 _normal m00001>所以，我想你一定
能和它好好相處的。<stop_lip_animation n00549 CLOSE_MOUTH>
